articles.title: Troops eliminate 21 Boko Haram/ISWAP terrorists in Geidam - Guardian
articles.description: The Nigerian Army says the troops of Operation Lafiya Dole (OPLD), on Friday, eliminated 21 Boko Haram/Islamic State West Africa Province (ISWAP) terrorists in the border town of Geidam in Yobe.

articles.description: Experts already knew T. rex was slow, with a max speed between 10 and 25 mph. But a new study suggests these predators preferred to walk even slower.

articles.title: 2021's first supermoon, the 'Pink Moon,' will rise on Tuesday. It won't be pink. - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Supermoons are rare full moons that occur when the moon is the closest it can get to Earth. According to NASA, there will be two supermoons in 2021.

The first supermoon of the year will happen Monday, appearing up to 30% brighter and 14% bigger than a typical full moon.
